title: System updates, newer models, innovations & more.
content:
I ain't into the pixel family or even the Google hardwares but I'm thinking of becoming one among you.

My few suggestions / questions :

> Why can't Google introduce a new range of mobiles in the line other than pixels ? They're supposed to be premium segments for which updates should be UnlimiteD :)

> Sky is the limit. I'm henceforth lookin' 4wd for newer innovations from Google on their products like that of Google pads / slate, with live emojis, Google's revamped UI apps and so on. Hardwares from Google needs a shift entirely into a new dimension whereby we as end users get system updates for > 3 yrs too....
Just sayin' !

Hoping for a better ride with the giants ;)

Thanks !
